trends: There have been no other sightings in Cape Elizabeth
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details1. I was in my bedroom in the house i used to live in (still in the same town as i am now)and i was sitting in bed watching tv.ched it 2. it literally filled the window directly infront of my bed. 3. i didn't know, i was in awe as i watched it 4. it was just slowly flying to the right (so, north), it was like two giant solid incredible bright triangles. attached is a sketch. it appeared flying horizontal, not in the sky, like if you take your arm, extend it out and turn your hand up so your hand is vertical. 5. i was astonished, i didnt know what it was, after a good 30ish seconds, i reached for a camera i had on a boreokcase, i looked up and tried to take a picture but it just coninuted until a tree blocked my view and it was gone. i ran to my parents room (i was still in school) and told them i saw something flying in the sky, my mom replied in a sleepy way "thats nice" and went back to sleep 6. it dissappeared behind a tree, it was massive, i could see its brightness behind the first few trees. until it disspeared.
Summary: Double triangle object, flying horizontally, extremely bright, huge, seen through window.
